member.name: T:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetAccount(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Gets an account by id.
member.returns: The account. If the account is not found, an empty account is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetAccounts(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all accounts by network name. Returns a collection of accounts.
member.returns: The account list. If no accounts are found an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetAccounts(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Gets all accounts by network id. Returns a collection of accounts.
member.returns: The account list. If no accounts are found an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetAccountsByApplication(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Gets all accounts by application id. Returns a collection of accounts.
member.returns: The account list. If no accounts are found an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetAccountsByContainer(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the accounts by container.
member.returns: The account list. If no accounts are found an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetAccountsByContainer(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the accounts by container.
member.param: if set to true sub-containers are included to the search.
member.returns: The account list. If no accounts are found an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.AccountExists(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Checks if account exist.
member.returns: If account exists True else False.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.CreateAccount(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Account)
member.summary: Creates an account.
member.remarks: The field will contain identifier of the new account.
member.exception: Account container is not found.
Account was created, but could not be read.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetNetworkAccountDisplayName(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.AccountCredentials,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.ApplicationCredentials,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)

member.returns: The account display name.

member.summary: Gets an account display name in a social network.
member.returns: The account display name.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.AccountManager.GetDaysUntilRenewalRequired(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Gets the number of days before the required renewal of an account.
member.returns: The number of days. If negative then account expired, if null then account renewal disabled or not needed.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.ApplicationManager.GetApplicationContainer(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the application container by account container.
member.returns: The application container. If the application container is not found string.Empty is returned.

example.code:
var applicationContainer = applicationManager.GetApplicationContainer("/sitecore/system/Social/Accounts");
Console.WriteLine("The application container for the account container /sitecore/system/Social/Accounts is: {0}", applicationContainer);

member.name: T:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods that are used to get extended user information.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.GetSocialProfiles(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets all social profiles of the user.
member.returns: The social profiles list. If there are no profiles, an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.GetSocialProfile(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a social profile of the user in the specified network.
member.returns: The social profile. If there are no profiles, an empty profile is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.SocialProfileExists(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,System.String)
member.summary: Defines if there is a social profile in the specified network.
member.returns: true if the social profile exists; otherwise, false.

example.code:
var result = Sitecore.Context.User.SocialProfileExists("Facebook");
Console.WriteLine("The social profile exists: {0}", result);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.AttachSocialProfile(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.SocialProfile)
member.summary: Attaches a social profile to the specified user.
member.exception: Following user already has another attached account of the same network.
There is another user with the same account in domain.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.DetachSocialProfile(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,System.String)
member.summary: Removes a social profile from the specified user.
member.exception: Following user has not account in this network.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.UpdateSocialProfile(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.SocialProfile)
member.summary: Updates a social profile of the specified user.
member.exception: Following user has not account in this network.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.GetPostingPreferences(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,System.String)
member.summary: Gets user's posting preferences for all the messages attached to the specific container.
member.returns: The posting preference list. If no preferences are found an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.GetPostingPreference(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Gets user's posting preferences for the specific message.
member.returns: The posting preference. If the posting preference is not found the value is used.

example.code:
var postingPreference = Sitecore.Context.User.GetPostingPreference(messageId);
Console.WriteLine("Message Id: {0}, Automatic Posting Preference: {1}", postingPreference.MessageId, postingPreference.AutomaticPostingPreference);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.SetPostingPreference(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.AutomaticPostingPreference)
member.summary: Sets user's posting preferences to the specific message.
member.exception: Message is not found.
Invalid message template.
Unable to set preference to the anonymous user.

example.code: Sitecore.Context.User.SetPostingPreference(messageId, AutomaticPostingPreference.Denied);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.Extensions.UserExtensions.SetPostingPreference(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,System.String,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.AutomaticPostingPreference)
member.summary: Sets user's posting preferences to all the messages found by arguments.
member.exception: Unable to set preference to the anonymous user.

example.code: Sitecore.Context.User.SetPostingPreference("sitecore://master/{968897F1-328A-489D-88E8-BE78F4370958}?lang=en&ver=1", AutomaticPostingPreference.Denied);

member.summary: Gets messages by account.

member.summary: Gets messages created on a specific date.

member.summary: Gets all messages posted to a social network.
member.returns: The messages list. If no messages are found an empty list is returned.

member.summary: Gets messages posted to a social network on a specific date.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.MessageManager.GetNotPostedMessages
member.summary: Gets all messages that are not posted to a social network.
member.returns: The messages list. If no messages are found an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.MessageManager.GetMessagesReadyToPostAutomatically(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier})
member.summary: Gets messages that are ready to be posted automatically.
member.returns: The messages list. If no messages are found an empty list is returned.
member.remarks:
This method will search messages by the following parameters:
Content posting configuration.
Content item is published.
"Post automatically" is checked.
Message is not in a workflow. Or message is in a final workflow state.
Message is not posted.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.MessageManager.GetMessagesCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets number of messages attached to specific container.
member.returns: The number of messages attached to the specific container.

example.code:
var homeItemMessagesCount = messageManager.GetMessagesCount("sitecore://master/{110D559F-DEA5-42EA-9C1C-8A5DF7E70EF9}?lang=en&ver=1");
Console.WriteLine("There are {0} messages attached to /sitecore/content/home item.", homeItemMessagesCount);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.MessageManager.CreateMessage(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Message)
member.summary: Creates a message.

item.description: The field will contain identifier of the created message.

To post messages automatically on a goal triggering the following rule should be configured for the goal:
condition System: where true (actions always execute)
action Social: post associated messages

member.exception: Posting configuration builder is not found.
Invalid casts occured.
Invalid values are presented.
Item is not found.
Message data builder is not found.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.NetworkManager.CanPostTo(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Determines whether it is possible to post messages to the network.
member.returns: true if it is possible to post messages to the network; otherwise, false. false is returned, if the network is not found.

example.code:
var result = networkManager.CanPostTo(facebookId);
Console.WriteLine("Can post to network: {0}", result);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.NetworkManager.CanPostTo(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether it is possible to post messages to the network.
member.returns: true if it is possible to post messages to the network; otherwise, false. false is returned, if the network is not found.

example.code:
var result = networkManager.CanPostTo("Facebook");
Console.WriteLine("Can post to network: {0}", result);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.NetworkManager.CanRenewAccount(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Determines whether it is possible to renew a network account.
member.returns: true if it is possible to renew the network account; otherwise, false. false is returned, if the network is not found.

example.code:
var result = networkManager.CanRenewAccount(facebookId);
Console.WriteLine("Can renew network account: {0}", result);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.NetworkManager.CanRenewAccount(System.String)

example.code:
var result = networkManager.CanRenewAccount("Facebook");
Console.WriteLine("Can renew network account: {0}", result);

Console.WriteLine("Can get a network account info: {0}", result);

member.name: P:Sitecore.Social.Api.NetworkManager.NetworkBusinessManager

member.name: T:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager
member.summary: Defines the methods that are used to manage users posting preferences.
member.remarks: Use it to manage posting preferences of the website visitors (whether or not they want messages to be posted automatically on their social network walls, for example, when you have configured Sitecore to post messages to the social network when a visitor achieves a goal on the website).

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.#ctor(Sitecore.Social.IPostingPreferenceBusinessManager,Sitecore.Social.Domain.IMessageManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.GetPostingPreferences(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets user's posting preferences for all messages attached to the specific container.
member.returns: The posting preference list. If no preferences are found an empty list is returned.
member.exception: Automatic posting preference is not supported.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.GetPostingPreference(System.String,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier)
member.summary: Gets user's posting preferences for the specific message.
member.returns: The posting preference. If the posting preference is not found the value is used.

example.code: var postingPreference = postingPreferenceManager.GetPostingPreference(@"extranet\johnsmith", messageId); Console.WriteLine("Message Id: {0}, Automatic Posting Preference: {1}", postingPreference.MessageId, postingPreference.AutomaticPostingPreference);

member.exception: Automatic posting preference is not supported.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.SetPostingPreference(System.String,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.AutomaticPostingPreference)
member.summary: Sets user's posting preferences to the specific message.
member.exception: Message is not found.
Invalid message template.
Unable to set preference to the anonymous user.
Automatic posting preference is not supported.

example.code: postingPreferenceManager.SetPostingPreference(@"extranet\johnsmith", messageId, AutomaticPostingPreference.Denied);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.SetPostingPreference(System.String,System.String,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.AutomaticPostingPreference)
member.summary: Sets user's posting preferences for all messages attached to the specific container.
member.exception: Unable to set preference to the anonymous user.
Automatic posting preference is not supported.

example.code: postingPreferenceManager.SetPostingPreference(@"extranet\johnsmith", "sitecore://master/{968897F1-328A-489D-88E8-BE78F4370958}?lang=en&ver=1", AutomaticPostingPreference.Denied);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.AllowAutomaticPostingByDefault
member.summary: Determines if automatic posting is allowed by default.
member.remarks: The value is set in the [website_root]\app_config\include\social\sitecore.social.config file, in the "Social.AllowMessageGoalPostingByDefault" setting
member.returns: true if automatic posting is allowed by default, otherwise false.

example.code:
var allowAutomaticPostingByDefault = postingPreferenceManager.AllowAutomaticPostingByDefault();
Console.WriteLine("Allow automatic posting by default: {0}", allowAutomaticPostingByDefault);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.AllowAutomaticPosting(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier,System.String)
member.summary: Allows automatic message posting.
member.returns: true if automatic posting is allowed, otherwise false.
member.exception: AutomaticPostingPreference is not supported

example.code:
var allowAutomaticPosting = postingPreferenceManager.AllowAutomaticPosting(messageId, @"extranet\johnsmith");
Console.WriteLine("Allow automatic posting: {0}", allowAutomaticPosting);

member.name: P:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.MessageManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the message manager.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Social.Api.PostingPreferenceManager.PostingPreferenceBusinessManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the posting preference business manager.

member.summary: Gets a social profile.
member.returns: The social profile. If there are no profiles, an empty profile is returned.

member.summary: Gets a primary social profile.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.SocialProfileExists(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Defines if there is a social profile in the specified network.
member.returns: true if the social profile exists; otherwise, false.

example.code:
var result = socialProfileManager.SocialProfileExists(@"extranet\johnsmith", "Facebook");
Console.WriteLine("The social profile exists: {0}", result);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.SocialProfileExists(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier,System.String)
member.summary: Defines if there is a social profile in the specified network.
member.returns: true if the social profile exists; otherwise, false.

example.code:
var result = socialProfileManager.SocialProfileExists(contactId, "Facebook");
Console.WriteLine("The social profile exists: {0}", result);

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.AttachSocialProfile(System.String,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.SocialProfile)
member.summary: Attaches a social profile to the specified user.
member.exception: Following user already has another attached account of the same network.
There is another user with the same account in domain.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.RetrieveSocialProfile(System.String,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.ApplicationCredentials,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.AccountCredentials)
member.summary: Retrieves a social profile from the social network.
member.returns: The social profile. If the request couldn't be executed, an is returned.
member.exception: The network provider is not implemented IGetAccountInfo interface.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.RefreshSocialProfiles(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes all social profiles attached to a user from social networks.
member.param: if set to true the social profiles will be refreshed asynchronously.
member.remarks: Only expired social profiles will be refreshed. The expiration configuration is defined in "Social.ProfileUpdating.DaysBeforeExpiration" setting.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.RefreshSocialProfiles(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes all social profiles attached to a contact from social networks.
member.param: if set to true the social profiles will be refreshed asynchronously.
member.remarks: Only expired social profiles will be refreshed. The expiration configuration is defined in "Social.ProfileUpdating.DaysBeforeExpiration" setting.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.RefreshSocialProfiles(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes all social profiles attached to a user from social networks.
member.param: if set to true the social profiles will be refreshed asynchronously.
if set to true the expiration configuration of the social profile will be ignored and the social profiles will be refreshed in any case.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.RefreshSocialProfiles(Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.Identifier,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes all social profiles attached to a contact from social networks.
member.param: if set to true the social profiles will be refreshed asynchronously.
if set to true the expiration configuration of the social profile will be ignored and the social profiles will be refreshed in any case.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Api.SocialProfileManager.RefreshSocialProfile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Refreshes the social profile attached to a user from the specified network.
member.remarks: The expiration configuration of the social profile will be ignored and the social profile will be refreshed in any case.

member.summary: Refreshes the social profile attached to a contact from the specified network.
member.remarks: The expiration configuration of the social profile will be ignored and the social profile will be refreshed in any case.

member.summary: Refreshes the social profile attached to a user from the specified network.
